Posts.Content: Hi teena ((((hugs)))) I have watched a good friend go though this. It started with a small lump....it came back worse. We had talked about a bilateral mastectomy and she chose the lumpectomy. Doing it over again...she says she would have had them both removed as soon as the cancer reared its ugly head. I am "high risk" and being watched. I am totally with you on the bilateral mastectomy. Its something i have thought long and hard about....and I too would want them both gone. vent all you want.... its good for you Hang in there hun...... and good luck next week!!!!
Posts.Signature: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain.
Posts.Title: New to site and scared

Posts.Content: The first thing i asked the oncologist when they were going to start my friend on Folfox was if the were going to add a steroid into the mix. He said they wanted to see how he was going to do first..... He had every side effect at the top of the evil scale of badness..... it was horrible. They added in the Dexamethasone and the light shown and the angles sang..... he did much better after that. Sadly...i just picked them up and he needs to start on them again. Hang in there and I hope you wife starts to feel a bit better....
Posts.Signature: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. Posts.Title: Phenominal response to steroids. Is this the norm?

Posts.Content: I hope your girlfriend is smart enough...... to save her own life. If she is considering ignoring all the non veterinarian methods and looking for organic treatment of her cancer she may not survive to do much hiking and kayaking. here is the ONLY percentage she needs to know and understand. Breast cancer will kill her. If you love her.... i would suggest you not indulge her on this path.
